definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: The growers are busy day and night, with harvest smile on his face.
sentences.chinese: 果農們日夜忙碌，臉上帶着豐收的微笑。

sentences.english: He began to work day and night for the construction of the capital of New China.
sentences.chinese: 他開始爲新中國首都的建設日夜操勞。

sentences.english: Even while the earth sleeps we travel.
sentences.chinese: 我們會日夜兼程，即便大地還在熟睡。

sentences.english: At all hours of the day and night.
sentences.chinese: 在所有小時的日夜奮戰。

sentences.english: They worked round the clock, refusing to go home.
sentences.chinese: 他們日夜不停地幹，家都不肯回了。

sentences.english: Half an hour later, they met the old man whom they miss all the time.
sentences.chinese: 半個小時後，他們終於見到了日夜思念的親人。

sentences.english: The noise which mke by crs disturbs residents living on both side of the street ll dy nd ll night.
sentences.chinese: 它所產生的噪音使街道兩旁的住民日夜不得安寧。

sentences.english: Therefore this day and night rain, whether you care about, always thing-in-itself and song.
sentences.chinese: 因此這日夜雨，不論你是否在意，總是自在而歌。

sentences.english: Thus, ten days where day and night to draft and thoughts on all the Problem.
sentences.chinese: 因此，十天之裏日夜趕稿，思緒全在習題上。

sentences.english: The feeling of guilt gnawed at my conscience day and night.
sentences.chinese: 忸捏日夜熬煎着我的良心。

sentences.english: Day-night map, reflecting part of the day is in town you need.
sentences.chinese: 日夜地圖，反映了一天的部分是你需要在城裏。

sentences.english: Shops that stay open twenty-four hours a day are a great convenience to the public.
sentences.chinese: 商店日夜服務，羣衆無不稱便。

sentences.english: The days and nights were a blur of medical reports.
sentences.chinese: 日日夜夜都是治療報告。

sentences.english: God why so much grief, and tears?
sentences.chinese: 老天何來那麼多的悲痛，日夜淚流不止？

sentences.english: You can't do much other than control the camera and change from day to night but the graphics are certainly impressive -- much better than the Wii could manage.
sentences.chinese: 整個過程中只能控制攝影機的角度以及日夜變化。

sentences.english: They have been traveling night and day for a whole week.
sentences.chinese: 他們日夜兼程已有整整一星期。

definition: day and night/period of 24 hours/continuously, without stop
the whole night/all through the night
without stopping to sleep or have a rest (idiom)
night and day (idiom); continuous strenuous effort
day after day/for several days running
day and night/regardless of the time of day or night
to wait for/to expect/to keep watch/to watch over/to nurse
